contribution.purpose: National and administrative level risk assessment

description: SWIO RAFI Zanzibar Tropical Cyclone Storm Surge

events.description: ZAN TC Storm Surge 25yr event, depth (m)

footprints._cf1_fp_data_query: ST_SetSRID(ST_Point(lon,lat), 4326) AS the_geom, i25_year AS intensity FROM paul.tc_zan_fss
